document_data.name: Lindelsan
document_data.mainbody: '''Lindelsan''' was the owner of [[The Black Boot (Tarmalune)|The Black Boot]], a popular tavern in [[Tarmalune]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: Lindelsan was a bald [[human]] male.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Pyrophobia|14}}
document_data.Background: Lindelsan homebrewed beer was very popular in Tarmalune in 1479 DR.
